displayName.text: New York City Police Department - 17th Precinct

formattedAddress: 167 E 51st St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 167 E 51st St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Worse police I have ever delt with. Unprofessional. If there is a way for them not to do work they will find it. If you need the police, better hope that this is not where they are coming from because they will take their time. Waited over an hour.

text.text: Worse police I have ever delt with. Unprofessional. If there is a way for them not to do work they will find it. If you need the police, better hope that this is not where they are coming from because they will take their time. Waited over an hour.

originalText.text: I came to this location to ask a few important questions and being that it was around midnight I was worried i would be bothering the officers there however this nice officer by the last name Cruz was very kind and helped with any questions I had. Made the experience less stressful.

text.text: I came to this location to ask a few important questions and being that it was around midnight I was worried i would be bothering the officers there however this nice officer by the last name Cruz was very kind and helped with any questions I had. Made the experience less stressful.

originalText.text: There was a situation where I had to put someone to the ground that was being violent and thought they had a sharp object in there hand. I got arrested. Even tho I felt I acted right towards the hostile situation,  I give these N.Y.P.D 17 precinct 5 stars. They treated me well. I love them. For all you haters, stop breaking the law, show some respect. These officers are by far the best from east to west and show much love. WE LOVE YOU N.Y.P.D FROM THE WEST COAST :)

originalText.text: My car was towed today because of Trump's visit.  The precinct operator located it immediately and I was able to walk and pick it up.  I was impressed how helpful they were.

text.text: My car was towed today because of Trump's visit.  The precinct operator located it immediately and I was able to walk and pick it up.  I was impressed how helpful they were.

originalText.text:
If you’re a man they believe you. If you’re a woman they don’t.  They don’t listen to women.
Don’t waste your time. They won’t help you.
